properties.areaDesc: Mifflin, PA; Huntingdon, PA; Perry, PA; Juniata, PA
properties.headline: Snow Squall Warning issued January 8 at 9:55AM EST until January 8 at 10:30AM EST by NWS State College PA
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a

* Snow Squall Warning for...
Northeastern Huntingdon County in central Pennsylvania...
Central Mifflin County in central Pennsylvania...
Northwestern Juniata County in central Pennsylvania...
Northeastern Perry County in south central Pennsylvania...

* Until 1030 AM EST.

* At 955 AM EST, a dangerous snow squall was located along a line
extending from Alfarata to near Mcalevys Fort, moving southeast at
50 mph.

HAZARD...Extremely poor visibility in snow and blowing snow. Wind
gusts up to 30 mph.

SOURCE...Radar indicated.

IMPACT...Expect hazardous road conditions.

* This includes the following highways...
Routes 22 and 522 from Strodes Mills to Lewistown.
Routes 22 and 322 from Lewistown to north of Duncannon.
Route 322 from Reedsville to Lewistown.
Route 522 from Lewistown to east of Alfarata.

Locations impacted include...
Lewistown, Burnham, Belleville, Newport, Highland Park, Yeagertown,
Mcalisterville, Spruce Hill, Strodes Mills, Reedsville, Juniata
Terrace, Mexico, Alfarata, New Buffalo, Ickesburg, Mcalevys Fort,
Walnut, Mifflintown, Port Royal and Thompsontown.
properties.instruction:
Reduce your speed and turn on headlights! During snow squalls, the
visibility may suddenly drop to near zero in whiteout conditions.

CMAMtext: Snow Squall Warning til 10:30 AM EST. Sudden whiteouts. Icy roads. Slow down! -NWS
